artist: Artist: Jim Dine; Author: Poetry by John Ashbery , et al.; Editor: Glenn Todd and Nancy Dine; Editor: Botanical notes compiled by Glenn Todd; Designer: Decorative book box designed by Jim Dine; Printer: R. E. Townsend, Inc., Georgetown, Massachusetts.; Publisher: The Arion Press
description: Bound in boards with green goatskin spine and grey-green cloth sides; enclosed in a grey-green cloth box with inset bas-relief "Flora's Temple Gate" by Jim Dine, cast in bonded bronze, on the lid. Poetry by John Ashbery, Richard G. Barnes, Hart Crane, Robert Creeley, E. E. Cummings, Hilda Doolittle, Robert Graves, Thom Gunn, Robert Hass, Andrew Hoyem, Ronald Johnson, Denise Levertov, Josephine Miles, Frank O'Hara, Ron Padgett, Robert Pinsky, Sylvia Plath, Ezra Pound, Kenneth Rexroth, James Schuyler, Edith Sitwell, Wallace Stevens, Philip Whalen, Jonathan Williams, and William Carlos Williams
dimension:
20 13/16 x 14 7/16 in. (52.86 x 36.67 cm) (book)
17 11/16 x 11 15/16 in. (44.93 x 30.32 cm) (plate, frontispiece)
20 1/2 x 14 in. (52.07 x 35.56 cm) (sheet, frontispiece)

medium: Drypoint, engraving, and power tools (29 prints); letterpress
provenance: (Granary Books, New York); sold to Mia, 1985
signed: Signed on introductory page in pencil, LL margin: J. Dine
title: The Temple of Flora
